block.p: Naria Beth Anna Halliwell, the daughter of Anne Sommerfeld Halliwell and Steven Halliwell of Irvington, N.Y., was married there yesterday evening to Peter Thomas Levine, a son of Ellen Levine and Dr. Richard Levine of New York. Rabbi Edward Schecter performed the ceremony at Sunnyside, the historic Hudson Valley house.

Naria Beth Anna Halliwell, the daughter of Anne Sommerfeld Halliwell and Steven Halliwell of Irvington, N.Y., was married there yesterday evening to Peter Thomas Levine, a son of Ellen Levine and Dr. Richard Levine of New York. Rabbi Edward Schecter performed the ceremony at Sunnyside, the historic Hudson Valley house.
The couple graduated from Brown University, where they met.

Ms. Halliwell, 25, is keeping her name. She is an associate producer at Oxygen Media, a New York company with a cable television network and a number of Web sites for women. Her mother owns Bridge Productions in Irvington, which represents photographers and painters and develops museum and gallery shows for them. Her father works in New York as chief executive of iTradeFinance.com, an online financial services company. He is also a managing director of River Capital Management, an investment management company specializing in Russian securities.

Mr. Levine, 27, is the vice president for planning in the finance department of Edison Schools, the New York-based for-profit manager of public schools around the country. His mother is the editor in chief of Good Housekeeping magazine in New York. His father is the vice chairman for clinical affairs in the obstetrics and gynecology department of the Columbia-Presbyterian Center in New York.
